alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 7:13PM EDT until July 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Oxford County in western Maine... West central Androscoggin County in southwestern Maine... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 712 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mechanic Falls, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Auburn, Mechanic Falls, Turner, Hebron, Minot, Oxford, Paris, Otisfield and Poland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
